1{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Decode specific content.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Tree
7  ( -- * Textual
8    treesTexts, treeText,
9    treesInterp,
10    -- * Numeric
11    treesDigits,
12    tokenClock,
13    treesTime, stringTime,
14  ) where
15
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                as S
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type             as D
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Message  as Msg
20
21import Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree.Pattern
22
23
24-- ----------------------  Text
25
26-- | Get single text from token trees.
27--
28--   >>> S.tt "'aa 'bb" >>= treesToText True
29--   Right "aabb"
30--
31--   >>> S.tt "aa bb" >>= treesToText False
32--   Right "aabb"
33--
34treesTexts :: Bool -> [S.TTree] -> B.Ab [String]
35treesTexts q = mapM $ treeText q
36
37-- | Get text from token tree.
38--
39--   >>> S.tt1 "aa" >>= treeText False
40--   Right "aa"
41--
42treeText :: Bool -> S.TTree -> B.Ab String
43treeText q (L tok) = tokenString q tok
44treeText _ _ = Msg.nothing
45
46-- | Get quoted/unquoted text.
47tokenString :: Bool -> S.Token -> B.Ab String
48tokenString True  (S.TText _ q w) | q > S.TextRaw  = Right w
49tokenString False (S.TTextRaw _ w)                 = Right w
50tokenString _ _  =  Msg.nothing
51
52
53-- ----------------------  Interp
54
55-- | Get interpretation from token trees.
56--
57--   >>> S.tt "term /a" >>= treesInterp
58--   Right (Interp { interpWords = [InterpText "term", InterpTerm "a"],
59--                   interpTerms = ["a"] })
60--
61treesInterp :: [S.TTree] -> B.Ab D.Interp
62treesInterp = Right . D.interp B.<=< mapM treeInterpWord
63
64treeInterpWord :: S.TTree -> B.Ab D.InterpWord
65treeInterpWord (B.TreeB _ _ _) = Msg.nothing
66treeInterpWord (B.TreeL x) =
67    case x of
68      S.TText _ _ w    -> Right $ D.InterpText w
69      S.TTermN _ _ n   -> Right $ D.InterpTerm n
70      S.TTerm _ _ [n]  -> Right $ D.InterpTerm n
71      _                -> Msg.nothing
72
73
74-- ----------------------  Number
75
76-- | Get digits from token trees.
77--
78--   >>> S.tt "-123 450.00" >>= treesDigits
79--   Right "-123450.00"
80--
81treesDigits :: [S.TTree] -> B.Ab String
82treesDigits = concatDigits B.<=< treesTexts False
83
84concatDigits :: [String] -> B.Ab String
85concatDigits = first where
86    first ((c : cs) : xs) | c `elem` "+-0123456789o" = loop [[c]] $ cs : xs
87    first _ = Msg.nothing
88
89    loop ss [] = Right $ concat $ reverse ss
90    loop ss (w : xs) | all (`elem` "0123456789.o") w = loop (w:ss) xs
91    loop _ _ = Msg.nothing
92
93
94-- ----------------------  Clock
95
96-- | Get clock from token.
97--
98--   >>> tokenClock $ head $ S.toks "|12:00|"
99--   Right |12:00|
100--
101tokenClock :: S.Token -> B.Ab D.Clock
102tokenClock (S.TTextBar _ ('|' : w)) = textClock w
103tokenClock _ = Msg.nothing
104
105textClock :: String -> B.Ab D.Clock
106textClock = sign where
107    sign ('-' : cs)  = D.clockNeg `fmap` dayOrHour cs
108    sign ('+' : cs)  = dayOrHour cs
109    sign cs          = dayOrHour cs
110
111    dayOrHour cs     = case getInt cs of
112                         (h, ':'  : cs')  ->  minute 0 h cs'
113                         (d, "'|")        ->  Right $ D.ClockD $ toInteger d
114                         (h, "|")         ->  clock D.ClockDh 0 h 0 0
115                         (d, '\'' : cs')  ->  hour (toInteger d) cs'
116                         _                ->  Msg.nothing
117
118    hour d cs        = case getInt cs of
119                         (h, ':' : cs')   ->  minute d h cs'
120                         (h, "|")         ->  clock D.ClockDh d h 0 0
121                         _                ->  Msg.nothing
122
123    minute d h cs    = case getInt cs of
124                         (m, ':' : cs')   ->  second d h m cs'
125                         (m, "|")         ->  clock D.ClockDhm d h m 0
126                         _                ->  Msg.nothing
127
128    second d h m cs  = case getInt cs of
129                         (s, "|")         ->  clock D.ClockDhms d h m s
130                         _                ->  Msg.nothing
131
132    clock k d h m s
133        | m >= 60    = Msg.nothing
134        | s >= 60    = Msg.nothing
135        | otherwise  = let (d', h') = h `divMod` 24
136                       in Right $ k (d + toInteger d') $ D.secFromHms (h', m, s)
137
138getInt :: String -> (Int, String)
139getInt = loop 0 where
140    loop n ""     = (n, "")
141    loop n (c:cs) = case fromDigit c of
142                      Just x  -> loop (10 * n + x) cs
143                      Nothing -> (n, c:cs)
144
145fromDigit :: Char -> Maybe Int
146fromDigit '0'  =  Just 0
147fromDigit '1'  =  Just 1
148fromDigit '2'  =  Just 2
149fromDigit '3'  =  Just 3
150fromDigit '4'  =  Just 4
151fromDigit '5'  =  Just 5
152fromDigit '6'  =  Just 6
153fromDigit '7'  =  Just 7
154fromDigit '8'  =  Just 8
155fromDigit '9'  =  Just 9
156fromDigit _    =  Nothing
157
158
159-- ----------------------  Time
160
161-- | Get time from token trees.
162--
163--   >>> S.tt "2013-04-18 12:00" >>= treesTime
164--   Right 2013-04-18 12:00
165--
166--   >>> S.tt "2013-04-18" >>= treesTime
167--   Right 2013-04-18
168--
169--   >>> S.tt "2013-#16" >>= treesTime
170--   Right 2013-#16
171--
172treesTime :: [S.TTree] -> B.Ab D.Time
173treesTime = stringsTime B.<=< treesTexts False
174
175-- | Get time from string.
176--
177--   >>> stringTime "2013-04-18 12:00"
178--   Right 2013-04-18 12:00
179--
180stringTime :: String -> B.Ab D.Time
181stringTime = S.tt B.>=> treesTime
182
183stringsTime :: [String] -> B.Ab D.Time
184stringsTime = year where
185
186    year []             = Msg.nothing
187    year (cs : xs)      = case getInt cs of
188                            (y, '-'  : cs')  -> mwd (toInteger y) $ cs' : xs
189                            _                -> Msg.nothing
190
191    mwd _ []                      = Msg.nothing
192    mwd y (('#' : '#': cs) : xs)  = day (D.dateFromYdAb y) $ cs : xs
193    mwd y (('#' : cs) : xs)       = week y $ cs : xs
194    mwd y xs                      = month y xs
195
196    month _ []          = Msg.nothing
197    month y (cs : xs)   = case getInt cs of
198                            (m, '-'  : cs')  -> day (D.dateFromYmdAb y m) $ cs' : xs
199                            (m, "")          -> D.timeFromYmAb y m
200                            _                -> Msg.nothing
201
202    week _ []           = Msg.nothing
203    week y (cs : xs)    = case getInt cs of
204                            (w, '-'  : cs')  -> day (D.dateFromYwdAb y w) $ cs' : xs
205                            (w, "")          -> D.timeFromYwAb y w
206                            _                -> Msg.nothing
207
208    day _ []            = Msg.nothing
209    day date (cs : xs)  = case getInt cs of
210                            (d, "") | null xs    -> do d' <- date d
211                                                       Right $ D.TimeYmd d'
212                                    | otherwise  -> do d' <- date d
213                                                       hour (D.timeFromDczAb d') $ concat xs
214                            _                    -> Msg.nothing
215
216    hour k cs           = case getInt cs of
217                            (h, "")          -> k (D.clockFromDh 0 h) Nothing
218                            (h, ':' : cs')   -> minute k h cs'
219                            _                -> Msg.nothing
220
221    minute k h cs       = case getInt cs of
222                            (m, "")          -> k (D.clockFromDhm 0 h m) Nothing
223                            (m, ':' : cs')   -> second k h m cs'
224                            (m, cs')         -> zone1 k h m Nothing cs'
225
226    second k h m cs     = case getInt cs of
227                            (s, "")          -> k (D.clockFromDhms 0 h m s) Nothing
228                            (s, cs')         -> zone1 k h m (Just s) cs'
229
230    zone1 k h m s cs    = case cs of
231                            '+' : cs'        -> zone2 k h m s   1  cs'
232                            '-' : cs'        -> zone2 k h m s (-1) cs'
233                            "UTC"            -> zone4 k h m s 0 0
234                            _                -> Msg.nothing
235
236    zone2 k h m s pm cs = case getInt cs of
237                            (zh, ':' : cs')  -> zone3 k h m s (pm * zh) cs'
238                            _                -> Msg.nothing
239
240    zone3 k h m s zh cs = case getInt cs of
241                            (zm, "")         -> zone4 k h m s zh zm
242                            _                -> Msg.nothing
243
244    zone4 k h m s zh zm = let c = D.clockFromHms (h - zh) (m - zm) s
245                              z = D.secFromHms (zh, zm, 0)
246                          in k c $ Just z
247
